system.requirements:
Tier 2: Psy Rating, Strong Minded, WP 40 
Aptitudes: Psyker, Defence
system.effect: When the Character or an ally within 10m is targeted by a Psychic Power, the character may choose to suffer any number of levels of Fatigue, each level suffered gives +10 to any Opposed Test to resist the power or Evasion Test to avoid its effects. If target's test to resist or avoid rolls a double, the character generates Psychic Phenomena as they would when making a Focus Power Tests.
